snippet.title: Microscopya Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Microscopya is a science-themed video game taking players on a journey through the molecular world inside the cell, with hand-drawn illustrations and puzzles based on real scientific concepts. This project aims to highlight the depth, complexity, and beauty of what makes life possible. This is the first game from Beata Science Art, featuring music by the talented Jamie van Dyck of Earthside.

Playable on Android, iOS and browsers!

Learn more at www.microscopya.com.

Listen to the music from the trailer on:
• Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/07Kb561YJV0axmCL5eKwDh 
• Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/album/microscopya-feat-earthside-original-game-soundtrack/1600521625 
• Other platforms: https://jamievandyck.ffm.to/microscopya.

Follow Beata Science Art:
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/beatascienceart
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/beatascienceart 
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/beatascienceart 
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/beatascienceart 

Follow Jamie van Dyck and his band Earthside: 
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jamie_earthside
                    https://www.instagram.com/earthsideband
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/earthsideband
• YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/earthsideband
• Website: https://www.earthsideband.com

A special thank you to our funders for making this project possible:
• AAAS IF/THEN Initiative: https://www.ifthenshecan.org/about
• ASCB COMPASS Outreach Grant: https://www.ascb.org/grants-awards/compass-outreach-grants
